mapper.select: select id,order_code orderCode,IFNULL(discount_fee,0) discountFee,settlement_type settlementType,pay_status payStatus,user_id ,order_status orderStatus,create_time createTime,IFNULL(total_fee,0) totalFee,IFNULL(payable_fee,0) payableFee,remarks, hd_status,delivery_time,IFNULL(delivery_fee,0) deliveryFee,delivery_address,hd_code from t_whs_order o where o.order_code = #{orderCode}

select t.id,g.goods_name goodsName,t.goods_standard_id goodsStandardId,u.unit_name unit,t.standard_weight standardWeight, t.goods_price goodsPrice,t.quanity,g.goods_image goodsImage,s.hd_sku_id,t.flash,t.discount_goods_price from t_whs_order_goods t LEFT JOIN t_whs_goods_standard s on t.goods_standard_id=s.id LEFT JOIN t_whs_goods g on g.id=s.goods_id LEFT JOIN t_whs_goods_unit u on u.unit_code=s.unit_code where t.order_id=#{orderId}

select id,order_code orderCode,IFNULL(discount_fee,0) discountFee,settlement_type settlementType,pay_status payStatus,user_id ,order_status orderStatus,create_time createTime,IFNULL(total_fee,0) totalFee,IFNULL(payable_fee,0) payableFee,remarks, hd_status,delivery_time,IFNULL(delivery_fee,0) deliveryFee,delivery_address,hd_code from t_whs_order o where o.id = #{0}

select t1.order_code as orderCode,t1.hd_code as hdCode,DATE_FORMAT(t1.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createTime, FORMAT(t1.total_fee/100.0,2) as totalFee,FORMAT(t1.discount_fee/100.0,2) as discountFee, FORMAT(t1.delivery_fee/100.0,2) as deliveryFee,FORMAT(t1.payable_fee/100.0,2) as payableFee,FORMAT(t3.refund_fee/100.0,2) as refundFee, case t1.order_status when 'failed' then '已失效' when 'unpaid' then '待付款' when 'paying' then '支付中' when 'undelivery' then '待发货' when 'delivery' then '配送中' when 'unrefunded' then '退货中' when 'refunded' then '退货成功' when 'received' then '已收货' end as orderStatus, case t1.hd_status when 'success' then '成功' when 'failed' then '失败' end as hdStatus,t2.user_name as userName,t2.phone as phone,t2.shop_name as shopName,t1.delivery_address as deliveryAddress,DATE_FORMAT(t1.receive_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as receiveTime, case t1.settlement_type when 'balance' then '余额支付' when 'wechat' then '微信支付' end as settlementType, DATE_FORMAT(t3.payment_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as paymentTime,case t1.invoice_status when 'yes' then '已开票' when 'no' then '未开票' end as invoiceStatus, DATE_FORMAT(t1.after_sale_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as afterSaleTime,case t1.after_status when 'yes' then '已开票' when 'no' then '未开票' end as afterStatus,t1.remarks as remarks from t_whs_order t1 LEFT JOIN t_whs_user t2 on t1.user_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN t_whs_payment_log t3 on t1.id = t3.order_id
and t1.create_time >= #{createTimeBegin} and t1.create_time <= #{createTimeEnd} and t1.order_code like CONCAT('%', #{orderCode},'%') and t1.order_status = #{orderStatus} and t1.pay_status = #{payStatus} and t1.settlement_type = #{settlementType} and t2.phone like CONCAT('%', #{phone},'%')
